name: Watermelon Ice Cream Cake
author: Michelle Hulshof
instructions: Line medium size bowl with aluminum foil. Cover foil with a thin layer of ice cream. Freeze for 1 hour. Mix chocolate chips with sherbet. Pour on ice cream. Freeze at least 24 hours. Mix food color- ing with Cool Whip. Empty contents of bowl on plate. Coat with Cool Whip. Freeze until ready to serve.
